title: User Sign-Up with Email
description: Verify that a new user can successfully sign up using valid email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-up page.
Enter a valid email address.
Enter a valid password following password policy.
Submit the sign-up form.
Confirm that the user is registered and redirected to the dashboard.

title: User Sign-In with Email and Password
description: Verify that an existing user can successfully sign in using valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page.
Input registered email and correct password.
Click the sign-in button.
Verify successful login and navigation to the main dashboard.

title: User Sign-In Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Ensure that sign-in fails with a proper error message when the password is incorrect.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page.
Input registered email with an invalid password.
Click the sign-in button.
Check that an error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials.

title: User Password Reset Flow
description: Verify that a user can successfully request and complete a password reset.

steps.description: Navigate to the password reset page.
Enter registered email to receive password reset instructions.
Submit the password reset request.
Verify that a password reset email is sent via Brevo SMTP.
Follow link in the email and set a new password.
Confirm password is updated and login succeeds with the new password.

title: User Sign-In via Google OAuth
description: Verify that users can authenticate successfully using Google OAuth login.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page.
Click on the Google OAuth login button.
Complete OAuth flow with valid Google credentials.
Verify that user is logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

title: Session Persistence Across Reloads
description: Verify user sessions persist across page reloads and navigation without requiring re-login.

steps.description: Sign in with valid credentials.
Refresh the web page.
Confirm the user remains logged in and on the same dashboard page.
Navigate between different sections (orders, reservations, menu, inventory).
Ensure user session persists and no login prompt appears.

title: Create New Order with Valid Data
description: Verify the creation of a new restaurant order with all required details succeeds and updates in real-time.

steps.description: Navigate to the orders section.
Open the new order dialog.
Input valid order details including customer, items, and quantities.
Submit the new order.
Check the order appears immediately in the orders table.
Verify order data syncs correctly in the backend (Supabase).

title: Edit Existing Order
description: Verify that editing an existing order updates the order details and reflects changes in real-time.

steps.description: Navigate to the orders section.
Select an existing order and open the edit order dialog.
Modify order details such as item quantity and special notes.
Save changes.
Confirm that updates are reflected immediately in the orders table.
Verify backend data consistency with updated order information.

title: Order Tracking - Status Update
description: Ensure that order statuses can be updated and status changes are broadcasted in real-time to the UI.

steps.description: Navigate to the orders section.
Update the status of an existing order (e.g., from 'Pending' to 'In Progress').
Check the updated status is immediately visible in the orders listing.
Validate status change notifications are sent if applicable.

title: Create Table Reservation
description: Verify that a customer can successfully make a table reservation and confirmation email is sent.

steps.description: Navigate to the table reservation section.
Input valid reservation details (date, time, number of guests, contact info).
Submit reservation.
Check reservation appears on the manager’s reservation dashboard.
Verify confirmation email is sent to the customer using Brevo SMTP.

title: Handle Reservation Scheduling Conflict
description: Ensure that conflicting table reservations are detected and appropriate errors are shown.

steps.description: Attempt to create a reservation for a table already booked for the requested time slot.
Verify that the system prevents double booking and displays an informative error message.

title: Add Menu Item
description: Verify that a manager can add a new menu item including inventory linkage successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the menu management section.
Open add menu item dialog.
Enter valid menu item details (name, description, price, linked inventory items).
Submit the new menu item.
Confirm new menu item appears in the menu listing.

title: Edit Menu Item
description: Verify changes to existing menu items update correctly and reflect in inventory.

steps.description: Navigate to the menu management section.
Select a menu item and open the edit dialog.
Make changes to item details and save.
Check that updates reflect immediately in the menu listing.
Verify inventory linkage remains consistent.

title: Inventory Stock Management
description: Verify that inventory items can be added, edited, and stock quantities updated accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to inventory management.
Add a new inventory item with valid details.
Confirm the inventory item is listed with correct details.
Edit an existing inventory item to update stock quantity.
Verify the updated stock count is reflected immediately.

title: Maintain Customer Profiles
description: Verify that customer profiles can be viewed, edited, and interaction histories maintained correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the customer management section.
Select a customer profile to view details.
Check customer information and interaction history are displayed correctly.
Edit customer data and save.
Confirm changes persist and reflected in profile view.

title: Staff Scheduling and Role Assignment
description: Verify that staff member details and scheduling can be created, edited, and saved properly.

steps.description: Navigate to staff management.
Add new staff member with role and schedule.
Verify new staff member appears in the staff list with correct role and schedule.
Edit existing staff member’s role and schedule.
Confirm that edits save and update the staff details listing.

title: Dashboard Analytics Display
description: Verify that analytics components load correctly and display accurate KPIs and reports on page load.

steps.description: Sign in and navigate to the main dashboard.
Check that all analytics widgets load without error.
Verify that key performance indicators display accurate data consistent with backend.

title: Email Notification on Reservation Confirmation
description: Verify that reservation confirmation emails are reliably sent to customers and staff.

steps.description: Create a new reservation.
Verify that confirmation emails are sent to customer via Brevo SMTP.
Check that staff receives notification email if configured.

title: Email Notification on Order Updates
description: Ensure order update notifications are sent to related customers and staff promptly.

steps.description: Modify an existing order status.
Confirm that email notifications are sent accordingly via Brevo SMTP.

title: UI Accessibility and Responsiveness
description: Verify that all UI components render correctly across desktop and mobile devices and meet accessibility standards.

steps.description: Access the dashboard and various management sections on desktop and mobile viewport sizes.
Check that all UI elements render correctly with no overlap or clipping.
Verify keyboard navigation and screen reader compatibility for interactive components.

title: API Performance Under Load
description: Validate that API endpoints for authentication and email services respond within acceptable performance limits under load.

steps.description: Simulate multiple concurrent sign-in and email request calls.
Monitor API response times and confirm they meet defined thresholds.

title: Error Handling on Network Failures
description: Verify the system handles network failures gracefully with appropriate user feedback during operations like sign-in, order updating, and email sending.

steps.description: Simulate network failure during sign-in.
Check that a user-friendly error message appears and no app crash occurs.
Simulate network failure when submitting a new order.
Verify order submission fails gracefully with retry or error message.
Simulate network failure when sending an email notification.
Confirm error handling does not block UI and logs the failure.

title: Logout and Session Termination
description: Verify that users can successfully log out and the session is terminated securely.

steps.description: Sign in with valid credentials.
Click the logout button.
Confirm user is redirected to the sign-in page.
Attempt to reload dashboard page.
Verify that user is not authenticated and prompted to log in.
